title: Castles made of sand
creator_credit: Paul Burnford and Paul Burnford Film Productions
brief_description: Presents a visual ode to sandcastles and those who build them. Explores a sandcastle-building competition and leads the imagination to a variety of thoughts about sandcastle symbolism. Some are simple, some complex - perhaps parallelling the nature of their builders.
